TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceReference extends System.Object

summary.span: 注册要在网页中使用的 Web 服务。

span.span: Registers a Web service for use in a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要从 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 中调用 Web 服务方法，必须在 ASP.NET 页中包含服务引用，并将 特性应用于 Web 服务类定义。To call Web service methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript), you must include a service reference in the ASP.NET page and apply the attribute to the Web service class definition. 如果在 ASP.NET 页内的或控件中包含对 Web 服务的服务引用 ，JavaScript 对象将在浏览器中实例化。If you include a service reference to a Web service in the or control inside the ASP.NET page, JavaScript objects will be instantiated in the browser. 代理对象将用于执行以下操作：The proxy objects will be used to do the following: - 将 JavaScript 中的异步请求用于 Web 服务方法，Make asynchronous requests in JavaScript to Web service methods, - 初始化服务器数据类型的代理的实例，该实例特定于用作调用 Web 方法的输入参数。Initialize instances of proxies of server data types, in particular for use as input parameters for invoking Web methods. > [!NOTE] > 控件只能用于同一个域中的服务。The control can only be used for services in the same domain. 可以通过将 `` 元素添加到 `` 页面中元素内的元素 `` ，然后设置其 属性（如下面的示例中所示），以声明方式定义 Web 服务位置。You can define the Web service location declaratively by adding an `` element to the `` element inside the `` element on the page, and then setting its attribute, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您可以使用 属性来指示代理生成脚本是否作为内联脚本块包含在页中，或由单独的请求获取。You might use the property to indicate whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request. 还可以通过 使用类的方法，通过 或 集合以 编程方式添加对象 。You can also programmatically add a object through the or collection by using the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在页标记中添加对 Web 服务的引用以从脚本中调用 Web 服务方法。The following example demonstrates how to add a reference to a Web service in the page markup to call the Web service methods from script. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/CS/Default.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/VB/Default.aspx#5)]

The proxy script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`参数是在 其上定义对象的对象或对象 。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined. 它应用作相对 URL 解析的基础。It should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

A proxy URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`参数是对象 或对象， 在其上 定义对象，并且应用作相对 URL 解析的基础。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined and should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是将代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块包含在页上还是通过单独的请求获取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request.

value.span: 如果代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块包含在页上，则为 ；如果通过单独的请求获取代理生成脚本，则为 。

span.span: if the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page; if the proxy generation script is obtained by a separate request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 未声明该属性，则默认值为 `false` 。When the property is not declared, the default value is `false`. 当 设置为时 `false` ，会通过向服务器发出额外的请求，将用于生成 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代理的脚本下载为单独的脚本文件。When is set to `false`, the script for generating the ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxies is downloaded as a separate script file by an additional request to the server. 如果使用浏览器缓存，则当多个网页使用相同的服务引用时，此选项很有用。If you use browser caching, this option is helpful when multiple Web pages use the same service reference. 当 设置为时 `true` ，代理生成脚本作为内联脚本块包含在页中。When is set to `true`, the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page. 这可以通过减少网络请求数来提高服务器性能，尤其是在页中有很多服务引用，并且其他页没有引用相同的服务时。This can improve server performance by reducing the number of network requests, especially if there are many service references in the page and other pages do not reference the same services. 此外， 当设置为时，属性必须设置为相对路径 `true` 。In addition, the property must be set to a relative path when is set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置引用的 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the referenced Web service.

value.span: 引用的 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: The path of the referenced Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性只能指向本地 Web 服务。The property can point only to local Web services. 换句话说，此属性只能指向启用了 AJAX 的 ASP.NET Web 应用程序所在域中的 Web 服务。In other words, this property can only point to Web services in the same domain as your AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web application. 可以是相对应用程序、相对于应用程序的相对路径或绝对路径。 can be a relative, application-relative, domain-relative, or absolute path. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则必须使用指向与包含实例的页面相同的 Web 应用程序的相对路径 。If the property is set to `true`, then you must use a relative path that points to the same Web application as the page that contains the instance.
